fields.name: Adarsh S
fields.title: Full Stack Developer
fields.bio:
Hi there I’m Adarsh, a passionate and driven full-stack developer who thrives on turning ideas into powerful digital solutions. I’m not just a coder — I’m a creator, a problem solver, and someone who never backs down from a challenge.

Quick on the uptake and bold in thought, I bring a creative, analytical mindset to everything I build — whether it’s crafting scalable backend systems or designing sleek, intuitive user interfaces. I'm the kind of developer who can't sleep until I’ve cracked a problem. If one solution doesn't work, I try five more.

Whether collaborating with a team or flying solo, I deliver clean, scalable code and seamless user experiences — always with a touch of innovation. I'm actively seeking new opportunities and freelance gigs to help brands, startups, and teams bring their ideas to life.

fields.title: AI-Powered Text Evaluation and Detection System
fields.description:
Engineered an AI-powered text evaluation system using Hugging Face GPT-2 models, boosting AI detection accuracy by 85% and
slashing false positives in AI-generated content detection by 30%.
Utilized perplexity-based linguistic analysis to enhance detection accuracy.
Integrated Hugging Face GPT-2 models, improving text evaluation accuracy by 20%.

fields.title: E-Commerce Web Application
fields.description:
Designed & developed a fully functional, high-performance E-Commerce platform using Django, JavaScript, and Bootstrap,
 enhancing system efficiency by 40%.
 Built an interactive, responsive UI with optimized CSS & JavaScript, improving user engagement by 50%.
 Implemented OTP-based authentication & email verification, reducing unauthorized access by 30% and enhancing security.
 Optimized database queries for product and order management, reducing server response time by 35%.
 Automated email notifications for order confirmation & password recovery, improving user trust and retention.
fields.tech_stack: Django, JavaScript, SQLite3, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS

fields.title: Automated ATS Resume Screening System
fields.description: Built an AI-powered ATS scanner, increasing resume-job matching accuracy by 35% and reducing recruiter screening time by 50%. Developed automated PDF to text conversion for seamless resume parsing. Integrated Google Gemini Pro to provide AI-driven resume optimization insights.
fields.tech_stack: Python, Streamlit, Google Gemini Pro, PyPDF2.
